content: @Marc Huisinga Explaining the project creation workflow in my class yesterday, I felt the need to explain that "Create Mathlib project"means "Create a project depending on Mathlib". Do you think you could change the wording? Maybe "Create a project using Mathlib" is better if you want to keep it short.
I think "Create a mathematics project" is too vague. It should say "Mathlib" somewhere.
Aside: are we now styling it Mathlib instead of mathlib? That's a curious artifact of the Lean 3/4 transition I think.
I think we indeed decided to use Mathlib instead of mathlib.
